title: anbilE AzhvArgaL
sahitya:
anbilE AzhvArgaL vAzhga vAzhgavE AcAriyArgaL vAzhgavE Om jaya hari


anupallavi

  emperumAnukkE tammuyiruDal poruL ellAm nivEdittE Eka bhakti sheidiDum


caraNam    vIrat-tirmangai viSNu siddhar bANar vipra nArAyaNar vAdat-tirumazhisai
sErak-kulashEkharar shrI ranganAyaki sArayOgi divya saDagOparAdiyar
AlavandAr nambi azhagiya maNavALar ariya yatirAjar Agama dEshikar
nALellAm Om namO nArAyaNavenrE nambip-prapannarAi embirAnaik-kalandE
